title: The Sims 5 will be free-to-play, according to this now-deleted job listing
description: The job advert was swiftly pulled offline, but not before the internet saw, and archived, the website, which clearly describes a switch to a "free-to-enter" funding model.

title: Assassin's Creed 4 Black Flag is reportedly getting a remake
description: Ubisoft is reportedly rebooting its 2013 sea-shanty adventure, although it's thought the remake is "still in its earliest stages".

title: A Song of Ice and Fire and Bowling: the VR games and apps I played in June 2023
description: For June 2023 I've explored the new Among Us VR map, entered a ForeVR Bowl tournament, and become an action star in Pistol Whip.

title: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum developer Daedalic quits game development
description: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum developer exits game development. Gollum's sequel has been cancelled, and the studio plans to let go of at least 25 of its 90-person team.

title: Here's why this original iPhone could break all previous auction records
description: Apple didn't make many of the 4GB original iPhones due to slow sales, but one of these phones is now up for auction.

title: Bing AI chatbot gets faster at responding – and better sports knowledge, too
description: A more responsive AI is clearly a key factor in keeping Bing chatbot users happy.

title: The Apple Car is a question of 'when, not if' according to one source
description: Might Apple be planning to follow up the Vision Pro with a self-driving, electric Apple Car? Definitely maybe.

title: These are the most dangerous software security flaws of the year - are you at risk?
description: MITRE has released its annual list of the biggest software flaws, with the top of the list remaining unchanged.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Saturday, July 1 (game #523)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: ChatGPT is now a brilliant tool for winding up telemarketers and scammers
description: Using GPT-4 and a voice cloner, this service can fool scammers into thinking they're talking a real person and it works.
